title: The PEdALED Lightweight and Insulated Mirai Alpha速 Jacket
content: Lightweight, warm, packable, the the Mirai Alpha速 Cycling Jacket is the latest windproof winter riding jacket by PEdALED. This jacket keeps the rider warm via Alpha速 Direct insulating fabric by Polartec速 and when combined with the entire Alpha lineup, is designed to keep your rides warm this winter. See the Mirai and the Alpha lineup at PEdALED today.
author: prolly
